hero.title: Reuniting What Was Lost, One Report at a Time
hero.subtitle: We're on a mission to help people find their missing loved ones, pets, and belongings through the power of community and technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Every day, people search for their missing loved ones, lost pets, important documents, and valuable belongings. Lqani.ma harnesses the power of community and technology to help reunite people with what matters most and bring hope to those who need it.

step1.title: Create a Report
step1.description: Upload photos and details about your missing person, pet, document, or item.

step2.title: Community Reports
step2.description: Community members who encounter someone upload their photo to help identify them.

step3.title: AI Matching
step3.description: Our advanced AI compares photos to find potential matches.

step4.title: Reunite Families
step4.description: When a match is found, we notify both parties to help facilitate reunion.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your data is encrypted and protected. We never share personal information without consent.

community.title: Community Powered
community.description: Every member of our community plays a vital role in reuniting families.

compassion.title: Compassion Driven
compassion.description: We understand the pain of separation and work tirelessly to bring families together.

cta.title: Join Us in Making a Difference
cta.description: Whether you're searching for something you've lost or want to help others, your participation matters.
